name: conjur
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing conjur cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`conjur` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-conjur).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing conjur cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-conjur)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-conjur` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-conjur/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-conjur` repo](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-conjur/issues).

provider.description:
The provider type for the conjur package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.
